title: Veliki Krš
text: Veliki Krš (<a href="Serbian%20Cyrillic">Serbian Cyrillic</a>: Велики крш) is a <a href="mountains%20of%20Serbia">mountain</a> in eastern <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>, near the city of <a href="Bor%2C%20Serbia">Bor</a>. Its highest peak "Veliki krš" has an elevation of 1,148 meters above sea level. Like nearby <a href="Mali%20Kr%C5%A1">Mali Krš</a> and <a href="Stol%20%28Serbia%29">Stol</a>, it is dominated by <a href="karst">karst</a> formations, and they are collectively known as "Gornjanski kras". Veliki Krš has an elongated karst ridge at the top section.
